description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. FreaKick is a soccer free kick game that allows 2 players to either be goalkeeper or kicker and try to score or block the goal. The player can also practice against the defenders. Curving with the thumb stick allows for special free kicks and the instant replay feature allows the player to see the amazing goal. The camera can be controlled to fit specific viewing needs.
